---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
full_dat_ADHD = subset(full_dat, PrimaryDiagnosis == 'ADHD')
full_dat_ADHD = subset(full_dat_ADHD, ADHD_Subtype %in% c('Combined', 'Inattentive'))
row.names(full_dat_ADHD) = 1:nrow(full_dat_ADHD)
```

```{r}
full_dat_ADHD_V1 = subset(full_dat_ADHD, SRS_VERSION == 1)
full_dat_ADHD_V2 = subset(full_dat_ADHD, SRS_VERSION == 2)
ggplot(full_dat_ADHD_V1, aes(x=SRS_TotalRawScore)) + geom_histogram()
ggplot(full_dat_ADHD_V2, aes(x=SRS_TotalRawScore)) + geom_histogram()
ggplot(full_dat_ADHD_V1, aes(x=mABC_TotalStandardScore)) + geom_histogram()
ggplot(full_dat_ADHD_V2, aes(x=mABC_TotalStandardScore)) + geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
ggplot(full_dat_ADHD, aes(x=SRS_TotalRawScore)) + geom_histogram()
ggplot(full_dat_ADHD, aes(x=mABC_TotalStandardScore)) + geom_histogram()
ggplot(full_dat_ADHD, aes(x=mABC_AGE)) + geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
ggplot(full_dat_ADHD, aes(full_dat_ADHD$mABC_TotalStandardScore, full_dat_ADHD$SRS_TotalRawScore)) + geom_point() + geom_jitter(alpha = 1)
```

```{r}
lm_mABC_total = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ mABC_TotalStandardScore + SRS_VERSION, full_dat_ADHD)
lm_mABC_components = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ mABC_ManualDexterity.Component.StandardScore + mABC_AimingAndCatching.Component.StandardScore + mABC_Balance.Component.StandardScore + SRS_VERSION, full_dat_ADHD)
anova(lm_mABC_components, lm_mABC_total)
```

```{r}
lm_gender = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ mABC_TotalStandardScore + SRS_VERSION + Gender, full_dat_ADHD)
lm_age = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ mABC_TotalStandardScore + SRS_VERSION + mABC_AGE, full_dat_ADHD)
lm_sd = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ mABC_TotalStandardScore + SRS_VERSION + SecondaryDiagnosis, full_dat_ADHD)
lm_subtype = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ mABC_TotalStandardScore + SRS_VERSION + ADHD_Subtype, full_dat_ADHD)
lm_GAI = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ mABC_TotalStandardScore + SRS_VERSION + GAI, full_dat_ADHD)

summary(lm_mABC_total)
summary(lm_gender)
summary(lm_age)
summary(lm_sd)
summary(lm_subtype)
summary(lm_GAI)
```

```{r}
anova(lm_gender, lm_mABC_total)
anova(lm_age, lm_mABC_total)
anova(lm_sd, lm_mABC_total)
anova(lm_subtype, lm_mABC_total)
anova(lm_GAI, lm_mABC_total)
```

```{r}
lm_mABC_sd_sub = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ mABC_TotalStandardScore + SRS_VERSION + SecondaryDiagnosis + ADHD_Subtype, full_dat_ADHD)
summary(lm_mABC_sd_sub)
plot(fitted(lm_mABC_sd_sub), stdres(lm_mABC_sd_sub))
qqnorm(stdres(lm_mABC_sd_sub))
qqline(stdres(lm_mABC_sd_sub))
```

```{r}
plot(influence(lm_mABC_sd_sub)$hat, stdres(lm_mABC_sd_sub))
```

```{r}
order(stdres(lm_mABC_sd_sub), decreasing = TRUE)
stdres(lm_mABC_sd_sub)[c(140, 134, 169)]
full_dat_ADHD_filtered = full_dat_ADHD[-c(140, 134, 169),]
```

```{r}
lm_mABC_sd_sub_filtered = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ mABC_TotalStandardScore + SRS_VERSION + SecondaryDiagnosis + ADHD_Subtype, full_dat_ADHD_filtered)
summary(lm_mABC_sd_sub_filtered)
plot(fitted(lm_mABC_sd_sub_filtered), stdres(lm_mABC_sd_sub_filtered))
qqnorm(stdres(lm_mABC_sd_sub_filtered))
qqline(stdres(lm_mABC_sd_sub_filtered))
```

```{r}
lm_mABC_sd_sub_interaction_filtered = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ mABC_TotalStandardScore + SRS_VERSION + SecondaryDiagnosis * ADHD_Subtype, full_dat_ADHD_filtered)
summary(lm_mABC_sd_sub_interaction_filtered)
plot(fitted(lm_mABC_sd_sub_interaction_filtered), stdres(lm_mABC_sd_sub_interaction_filtered))
qqnorm(stdres(lm_mABC_sd_sub_interaction_filtered))
qqline(stdres(lm_mABC_sd_sub_interaction_filtered))
```

```{r}
lm_mABCmd_sd_sub_interaction_filtered = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ mABC_ManualDexterity.Component.StandardScore + SRS_VERSION + SecondaryDiagnosis * ADHD_Subtype, full_dat_ADHD_filtered)
summary(lm_mABCmd_sd_sub_interaction_filtered)
```

```{r}
lm_mABCaac_sd_sub_interaction_filtered = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ mABC_AimingAndCatching.Component.StandardScore + SRS_VERSION + SecondaryDiagnosis * ADHD_Subtype, full_dat_ADHD_filtered)
summary(lm_mABCaac_sd_sub_interaction_filtered)
```

```{r}
lm_mABCbal_sd_sub_interaction_filtered = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ mABC_Balance.Component.StandardScore + SRS_VERSION + SecondaryDiagnosis * ADHD_Subtype, full_dat_ADHD_filtered)
summary(lm_mABCbal_sd_sub_interaction_filtered)
plot(fitted(lm_mABCbal_sd_sub_interaction_filtered), stdres(lm_mABCbal_sd_sub_interaction_filtered))
qqnorm(stdres(lm_mABCbal_sd_sub_interaction_filtered))
qqline(stdres(lm_mABCbal_sd_sub_interaction_filtered))
```

```{r}
lm_mABCbalsquared_sd_sub_interaction_filtered = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ I(mABC_Balance.Component.StandardScore^2) + SRS_VERSION + SecondaryDiagnosis * ADHD_Subtype, full_dat_ADHD_filtered)
summary(lm_mABCbalsquared_sd_sub_interaction_filtered)
plot(fitted(lm_mABCbalsquared_sd_sub_interaction_filtered), stdres(lm_mABCbalsquared_sd_sub_interaction_filtered))
qqnorm(stdres(lm_mABCbalsquared_sd_sub_interaction_filtered))
qqline(stdres(lm_mABCbalsquared_sd_sub_interaction_filtered))
```

```{r}
lm_mABCbalcubed_sd_sub_interaction_filtered = lm(SRS_TotalRawScore ~ I(mABC_Balance.Component.StandardScore^3) + SRS_VERSION + SecondaryDiagnosis * ADHD_Subtype, full_dat_ADHD_filtered)
summary(lm_mABCbalcubed_sd_sub_interaction_filtered)
plot(fitted(lm_mABCbalcubed_sd_sub_interaction_filtered), stdres(lm_mABCbalcubed_sd_sub_interaction_filtered))
qqnorm(stdres(lm_mABCbalcubed_sd_sub_interaction_filtered))
qqline(stdres(lm_mABCbalcubed_sd_sub_interaction_filtered))
```

```{r}
full_dat_ADHD_filtered$fitted_SRS_TotalRawScore <- 
predict(lm_mABCbal_sd_sub_interaction_filtered, newdata = full_dat_ADHD_filtered)

ggplot(full_dat_ADHD_filtered, aes(mABC_TotalStandardScore, SRS_TotalRawScore)) + geom_point() + geom_jitter() + geom_smooth() + geom_smooth(aes(mABC_TotalStandardScore, fitted_SRS_TotalRawScore), full_dat_ADHD_filtered, method = 'lm', col = 'red', lty = 2)
```
